page.title: 11The River Stour
page.content: The river runs through the centre of our area. It meanders across flat grass land. It is suitable for walking beside and there are many fish to be seen along with some interesting plant life. The old mill and its wheel have been preserved. Some children think that the river is polluted with a large amount of rubbish being dumped in it quite regularly. Some people do manage to fish from the waters. The river passes by two major factories in the area and flows on northwards through Canterbury and out to Sandwich Bay.
